title: Tomato Cream Sauce with Zucchini Noodles {Paleo + Vegan}
directions: In a saucepan combine the cream, pizza sauce, oil, starch, salt, pepper, garlic powder, onion powder, and red pepper flakes; heat until thickened, whisking the whole time; set aside.
Using a spiralizer make the Squash into noodles.
Add the squash noodles and baby kale into the sauce
Lightly boil noodles and kale in sauce until cooked through (1-3 minutes)
After noodles have been added, make sure to taste and re-adjust seasonings.
Top Pasta with pine nuts and cherry tomatoes
ingredients: 1 cup full-fat coconut milk I used heavy coconut cream
1 cup Pizza Sauce Find jar without High Fructose Corn Syrup
1 1/2 Tbsp Oil I used coconut oil, you can also use butter or non-dairy butter
4 1/2 tsp Starch Tapioca, Arrowroot or Potato Starch
1/2 cup Cherry Tomatoes Sliced in half
